data.body:
in /beads, the summary section should be limited to the first 7 lines of the description or notes text, with an 8th line that says

...show more... as a dark grean, bolded mouseover

when you mouse over, the text should vertically and float over the rows beneath it.

data.title: limit summary section of title row
